page.title: 09The M40 Motorway
page.content: The proposed M40 motorway will pass close to King's Sutton when it is built. It was going to be very near the houses in Wales Street and take away some of the gardens. Many residents did not want a motorway because they thought it took up too much good farming land and there was a protest meeting about it. Now it will be half a mile from the village. Many people are not very pleased about the motorway; they think it will be noisy and make pollution and they will not have the benefit of it because they have to go all the way to Banbury to find the nearest access.
